definitions.example: The denial of "There might be X" is the null, "False, there is no X."

definitions.definition: A refusal to comply with a request.
definitions.example: Every time we asked for an interview we got a denial.
The singer has issued a sweeping denial of all the rumors.

definitions.definition: Refusal to believe a problem exists
definitions.example: We couldn't break through his denial about being alcoholic.

definitions.definition: A defense mechanism involving a refusal to accept the truth of a phenomenon or prospect.
definitions.example: He is in denial that he has a drinking problem.
